Title: Tupac: Resurrection
Actors: Tupac Shakur, Rappin' 4-Tay, Conrad Bain, Bill Bellamy
Plot: Home movies, photographs, and recited poetry illustrate the life of Tupac Shakur, one of the most beloved, revolutionary, and volatile hip-hop M.Cs. of all time.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
